info.title: NAPI API Reference Doc
info.description: NAPI API reference doc can be used to get details of NAPI Server backend. This document includes list of endpoints with parameters, path, responses and definitions. Each endpoint has tags which indicate who (i.e. patient, app admin or platform admin) can access those.

get.description: The method to get list of apps.

post.description: The method to create a new app.

put.description: The method to update an app.

post.description: The method to create a new app version.

put.description: The method to update an app version.

delete.description: The method to disable an app version.

post.description: The method used to perform current o.s compatibility check.

get.description: The method gives app settings. App Settings have data transfer settings, api settings and custom settings

put.description: The method allow to create/update app settings. App Settings have data transfer settings, api settings and custom settings

post.description: The method to authenticate a patient using username/password or O'Auth access token.
The method to authenticate a user using SAML single sign-on.
The callback method from SAML single sign-on.
The method allow to change password. It should be used to create a permanent password

get.description: Method provides list of consents. List can be filter based on various query parameters.

post.description: The method to create a new consent.

put.description: The method to update a consent.

delete.description: The method to disable a consent.

put.description: Method to link consent with a given app. It also allow to disable existing relation of consent and application.

post.description: Method provides a way to create translation for a given consent.

put.description: Method provides a way to modify existing translation for a given consent.

delete.description: Method provides a way to delete existing translation for a given consent.

get.description: Method provides a way to get list of contents for a given app.

post.description: Method provides a way to create content for a given app.

put.description: Method provides a way to update content for a given app.

delete.description: Method provides a way to delete content for a given app.

get.description: The method to get list of devices. Patient can only get list of associated devcies and AppAdmin can get list of associated apps

post.description: The method to create a new device.

put.description: The method to update a device.

delete.description: The method to disable a device.

get.description: The method to get group and it's resource list.
The method to get group items for a specific group.

post.description: The method to add new item to a specific group.

put.description: The method to update item in a specific group.

delete.description: The method to disable item in a specific group.

get.description: The method to check server health.
The method to get log resource.

post.description: The method to create a new log.

put.description: The method to update a log.

delete.description: The method to disable a log.

post.description: [Not in Scope] Notify users subscribed to a topic
[Not in Scope] Notify individual devices

put.description: [Not in Scope] Update individual device's notifiaction settings

post.description: Method returns access token which is used to fetch device certificate.
Method returns device certificate.

get.description: The method lists all languages supported by System.
The method lists all regions supported by System.
The method to get a list of users. The patient can only get their own details and list of associated resources. The AppAdmin can only get list of patients associate with an app.

post.description: The method to create a new user.

get.description: The method to get user's own information.

post.description: The method to onboard patient. This creates device, device type and creates patient relation with app, device.

put.description: The method to update a user.

delete.description: The method to disable a user.

post.description: The method to associate a user with an app version.

put.description: The method to update the association between a user and an app version.

delete.description: The method to disassociate a user from an app version.

get.description: Provide list of user associated consents.

put.description: The method to update the association between a user plus an app version and a consent.

post.description: The method to associate a user and an app version with a device.

put.description: The method to update the association between a user plus an app version and a device.

delete.description: The method to disassociate a user and an app version from a device.

get.description: [Not in Scope] Provide list of user's configurations per apps.

put.description: [Not in Scope] Provide way to store of configuration related to notification settings on devices.

get.description: The method to get the status of a user device.

put.description: The method to update a specific status of a user device.

active.description: The active status of the content.

createdAt.description: The date time when the content is created.

createdBy.description: The user who creates the content.

lastChangeLogId.description: The id for the last change log.

details.description: The log details in parsed format.

items.description: The log details in parsed format.

detailsRaw.description: The log details in raw format.

active.description: The active status of the log.

Settings.description: model for app/user app notfication settings

authId.description: The authentication id for the user.

refIdType.description: The reference id type for the user.

refId.description: The reference id for the user.

firstName.description: The first name of the user.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

userApps.description: The applications belonging to the user.

active.description: The active status of the user.

createdAt.description: The date time when the user is created.

createdBy.description: The user who creates the user record.

lastChangeLogId.description: The id for the last change log.

fcmAppToken.description: The FCM app token i.e. Firecast server key

platformType.description: The platform type i.e. ios, web and android.

byod.description: The flag indicating whether it is a BYOD device.

settings.description: The device settings i.e. contain fcm registration key.

active.description: The active status of the device.
The active status of the owner group.

createdAt.description: The date time when the owner group is created.

createdBy.description: The user who creates the owner group.

lastChangeLogId.description: The id for the last change log.

logTypes.description: This is types of logs needs to be transferred

notificationInterval.description: Interval to notify user about data transfer

triggerTime.description: Interval to trigger data transfer very first time

failedTransferCount.description: The count of failure after patient to be notify

maxNotificationCount.description: Number of time patient to be notified for each failure

byod.description: The flag indicating whether it is a BYOD device.

description.description: The description of the device type.

active.description: The active status of the device type.

createdAt.description: The date time when the device type is created.

createdBy.description: The user who creates the device type.

lastChangeLogId.description: The id for the last change log.

deviceId.description: This is types of logs needs to be transferred

notificationId.description: This is equivalent to fcm registration id.

notificationPlatform.description: platform of device or mobile either ios or others

customSettings.description: custom settings which doesn't included above

DeviceSettings.description: Model for app/user app notification settings

NapiNotification.description: Model contains notification data and options i.e ttl, icon etc.

Region.description: The list of supported regions in system.

lastName.description: The last name of the user.

createdBy.description: The user who creates the user/app relation.

name.description: The name of the app version.

status.description: The status of the app version.

active.description: The active status of the app version.

results.description: The list of device in query result.

createdBy.description: The user who creates the owned group.

active.description: The active status of the app version.

createdAt.description: The date time when the app version is created.

createdBy.description: The user who creates the app version.

lastChangeLogId.description: The id for the last change log.

createdBy.description: The user who creates the app type.

lastChangeLogId.description: The id for the last change log.

active.description: The active status of the app version.

createdBy.description: The user who creates the app version.

lastChangeLogId.description: The id for the last change log.

results.description: The list of users in the query result.

allowed.description: flag indicate if current os is allowed or not.

GetApps.description: The list of apps in system.
